title: Plutus PAB Typescript SDK
description: Cardano dApp and Smart Contract developers will need an open-source SDK that enables interactions with the Plutus Application Backend.
solution: Indigo Labs will design and develop a Typescript SDK that allows developers to interact with PAB and ChainIndex services, vital for dApps.
experience: Team of 3 Haskell devs, 1 web dev (Plutus experience), 1 marketing lead, and 2 tech consultants. Top 20 Plutus repository contributors.
